original_title: The Last Two Lovers at the End of the World
overview: On New Year’s Eve of 2029, a six-mile wide asteroid is headed for Earth and set to wipe out humanity and the repressive society that now plagues Los Angeles. One young couple aims to survive this catastrophic event together while simultaneously transforming their civilization into the utopia they desire.
tagline: A future-set, New Year’s Eve wild night’s journey that follows two young lovers as they try to survive the end of the world.
title: The Last Two Lovers at the End of the World
